programOutcomes.label: a
programOutcomes.content: Apply knowledge of computing, science and mathematics appropriate to the discipline.

programOutcomes.label: b
programOutcomes.content: Understand best practices and standards and their applications.

programOutcomes.label: c
programOutcomes.content: Analyze complex problems and identify and define the computing requirements appropriate to its solution.

programOutcomes.label: d
programOutcomes.content: Identify and analyze user needs and take them into account in the selection, creation, evaluation and administration of computer-based systems.

programOutcomes.label: e
programOutcomes.content: Design, implement and evaluate computer-based systems, processes,components or programs to meet desired needs and requirements under various constraints.

programOutcomes.label: f
programOutcomes.content: Integrate IT-based solutions into the user environment effectively.

programOutcomes.label: g
programOutcomes.content: Apply knowledge through the use of current techniques, skills, tools and practices necessary for the IT profession.

programOutcomes.label: h
programOutcomes.content: Function effectively as a member or leaderof a development team recognizing the different roles within a team to accomplish a common goal.

programOutcomes.label: i
programOutcomes.content: Assist in the creation of an effective IT project plan.

programOutcomes.label: j
programOutcomes.content: Communicate effectively with the computing community and with society at large about complex computing activities through logical writing, presentations and clear instructions.

programOutcomes.label: k
programOutcomes.content: Analyze the local and global impact of computing information technology on individuals, organizations and society.

programOutcomes.label: l
programOutcomes.content: Understand professional, ethical, legal, security and social issues and responsibilities in the utilization of information technology.

programOutcomes.label: m
programOutcomes.content: Recognize the need for and engage in planning self-learning and improving performance as a foundation for continuing professional development.

courseLearningOutcomes.content: Develop and execute the project requirements based from the proposal document.
Test and evaluate the software product to validate for the process and output.
Complete the system defined in the plan to satisfy the project specifications and present final documentation.
